content:
currently, title text for people with green dots is "name is active", orange is "name is not active", and white is "name".
Should this instead be
green: "name is active"
orange: "name has Zulip open"
white: "name is not active"
?

@Rishi Gupta yes, open an issue. I think we might also want to move it to just the presence symbol, not the person's name; We might want hovering their name to do something more like showing their profile UI.
I would consider making it a bit more explicit: "name has Zulip open but is idle"
vs "name has Zulip open and is active"
We quite possibly should also change the orange to something less bad-feeling.
Since online-but-idle is still happy and reachable.
